channel.title: Artim317 ★ 22 Skills ★ Grand Exchange ★ Economy ★ Boss Points ★ Killcount ★ BETA
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://i63.tinypic.com/15dwfog.png[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Greetings Mopar-Community![/b][/size]
Me & some other developers have been working on a new 317 server. We have decided we are finally ready to release our BETA.
[u]MORE MEDIA & INFO COMING SOON + ANSWERING ANY LEGIT QUESTION[/u] [b] Introduction:[/b]
[spoiler][b]We want to make it clear to everyone that this is beta and not an official release, we have been working very hard on this project and are willing to continue with your help, the players, to develop the most finest gameplay. That is why we're starting with a Beta release, to create this in the most efficent way and work on what has to be worked on and build up unique features. There are most likely several bugs & suggestions that can improve the gameplay. An official release will be happening when we finally feel that the server is in it's most finest imaginable condition possible. [/b]
We have a lot of features to present, ofcourse, this thread would be huge if we wrote every single one. The idea with the beta is for the users to go and find out and try them out. We really appreciate all the bug reports and suggestion threads submitted on the [url=http://www.artimproject.com]forums[/url] so we can theraly go through them and develop as a server.[/spoiler]
[b]Features:[/b]
[spoiler][b]22 Skills Fully(!) Working! Perfect combat system Working emotes Grand Exchange Lottery Working bosses & drops 100% functioning curses PK Highscores scoreboard (other scoreboard's in progress) Flawless banking system (bank pin etc..) + search options Custom written duel rules HD minimap, 602 NPC's A CUSTOM written Anti Dupe system, 100% functioning Fully functioning Lunar & Ancient spellbooks Clue Scrolls KDR System Perfect switching Fully working clan system Custom added home with edited objects to present the finest looking home possible! Hand cannons (special attacks in progress..) Working Slayer & Slayer points (a slayer shop in progress..) Working barrows, pest control & many more minigames (slight spawn delay on barrows) Working bosses (see Spell book > Boss teleport) Custom written Killcount system (::kc) ( Currently working on a custom 'boss points' shop) Custom added starter packet's for BETA.[/b]
[u][i]And Much, Much more ...[/i][/u][/spoiler]
[b]Media:[/b]
[spoiler] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/1aeafdada2b1c9aace1d6d3b223627a2.png[/img] [img]http://artimproject.com/community/uploads/monthly_2015_12/KC.thumb.png.05f47b6b7da698765dc5c41b33c53c62.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/987298466ce694ba398d37fb347b8a3b.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/94aa610b5dcc36bba321a479ee13ee21.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/0c12088f95b01aafc9cd362c0375aebf.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/556ec5a5219b6d6715865a32d6df4498.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/7c82d9796f398030c23b2808604e4fae.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/0faba771794492ef3e2ae42fad63c2c9.png[/img]
[/spoiler]
[b]Links[/b] [spoiler] [size=15pt][url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/eow4x2oh3idqore/Artim317.jar?dl=1]317 Download[/url][/size] [url=http://]718 Download[/url] [url=http://www.Artimproject.Com]Artim Project Website[/url][/spoiler]
[b]Important information:[/b] The skiller starter pack includes 25m while the rest have 20m. This is to have to ability to explore all the content in the game. All of the starter packages also includes higher gear for reaching higher combat levels, these starter packs are just temporary and specially made for Beta. Nothing is written in stone, and we appreciate all the suggestions for improving
[/center]

item.title: Artim317 ★ 22 Skills ★ Grand Exchange ★ Economy ★ Boss Points ★ Killcount ★ BETA
item.dc:creator: @Artim_Project Artim Project
item.description:
@Artim_Project wrote:

Updates so far, more to come:

  • “There are currently – players online” is now printed when you login.

  • Improved the “make-over mage” room. + Added General store & Shop Assistant.

  • Added/Removed some items from the shops (e.g. anti-dragon shield)

  • Changed prices from a bunch of items in order to make a better economy

  • Changed minimap icons @ home :

  • …

item.title: Artim317 ★ 22 Skills ★ Grand Exchange ★ Economy ★ Boss Points ★ Killcount ★ BETA
item.dc:creator: @Artim_Project Artim Project
item.description:
@Artim_Project wrote:

[center]

[size=14pt]Greetings Mopar-Community![/size]

Me & some other developers have been working on a new 317 server.
We have decided we are finally ready to release our BETA.

[u]MORE MEDIA & INFO COMING SOON

  • ANSWERING ANY LEGIT QUESTION[/u]

    Introduction:

[spoiler]We want to make it clear to everyone that this is beta and not an official release,
we have been working very hard on this project and are willing to continue with your help, the players, to develop the most finest gameplay.
That is why we’re starting with a Beta release, to create this in the most efficent way and work on what has to be worked on and build up unique features.
There are most likely several bugs & suggestions that can improve the gameplay.
An official release will be happening when we finally feel that the server is in it’s most finest imaginable condition possible.

We have a lot of features to present, ofcourse, this thread would be huge if we wrote every single one.
The idea with the beta is for the users to go and find out and try them out.
We really appreciate all the bug reports and suggestion threads submitted on the forums so we can theraly go through them and develop as a server.[/spoiler]

Features:

[spoiler]22 Skills Fully(!) Working!
Perfect combat system
Working emotes
Grand Exchange
Lottery
Working bosses & drops
100% functioning curses
PK Highscores scoreboard (other scoreboard’s in progress)
Flawless banking system (bank pin etc…) + search options
Custom written duel rules
HD minimap, 602 NPC’s
A CUSTOM written Anti Dupe system, 100% functioning
Fully functioning Lunar & Ancient spellbooks
Clue Scrolls
KDR System
Perfect switching
Fully working clan system
Custom added home with edited objects to present the finest looking home possible!
Hand cannons (special attacks in progress…)
Working Slayer & Slayer points (a slayer shop in progress…)
Working barrows, pest control & many more minigames (slight spawn delay on barrows)
Working bosses (see Spell book > Boss teleport)
Custom written Killcount system (::kc) ( Currently working on a custom ‘boss points’ shop)
Custom added starter packet’s for BETA.

And Much, Much more …[/spoiler]

Media:

[spoiler]


987298466ce694ba398d37fb347b8a3b.png766×531





[/spoiler]

Links

Artim Project Website[/spoiler]

Important information: The skiller starter pack includes 25m while the rest have 20m.
This is to have to ability to explore all the content in the game.
All of the starter packages also includes higher gear for reaching higher combat levels,
these starter packs are just temporary and specially made for Beta.
Nothing is written in stone, and we appreciate all the suggestions for improving

[/center]
